summary: Encapsulates the behavior of a two‑dimensional finite element, providing core helper routines to evaluate shape functions, their gradients, and the element matrices and vectors needed for numerical analysis (e.g., stiffness, mass, stress, strain‑displacement, internal force).
business_intent: Enables engineering simulation software to model and solve physical problems (structural, thermal, etc.) using the finite element method by supplying the elemental contributions for global system assembly.
